details.description: Email case-sensitive login - Login should be case-insensitive
details.hint: Look for the login endpoint and check if email is normalized to lowercase

details.description: Duplicate email registration allowed - Should check for existing email
details.hint: Look for signup endpoint - is there a check for existing user before creating?

details.description: Logout doesn't clear token from localStorage
details.hint: Check the logout function - does it remove the token from localStorage?

details.description: Password minimum length not enforced - Should require 6+ characters
details.hint: Check signup endpoint - is password length validated?

details.description: Save creates duplicate entries - Should update existing diagram with same title
details.hint: In POST /diagrams, check if a diagram with same title exists before creating new one

details.description: Load diagram doesn't populate textarea - diagram code not loaded properly
details.hint: When loading a diagram, is setUserInput called with the description?

details.description: Save button stays disabled after save completes
details.hint: Check if setIsSaving(false) is called in a finally block

details.description: Last saved timestamp doesn't update after saving
details.hint: Check if updated_at is set from API response data, not from old state

details.description: Title field doesn't clear after save - should reset form
details.hint: After onSave is called, should the form fields be reset?

details.description: My Diagrams shows everyone's diagrams - Missing user_id filter
details.hint: In GET /diagrams, is the query filtering by user_id?

details.description: Delete removes wrong diagram - passing wrong diagram to handler
details.hint: Check handleDeleteClick - is the correct diagram being passed?

details.description: Diagram count doesn't update after delete
details.hint: After delete API call, is the local diagrams state being updated?

details.description: Created date shows raw ISO format instead of readable date
details.hint: Is the date being formatted before display?

details.description: Export filename always 'diagram.png' - should use diagram title
details.hint: Check getExportFilename - is the diagram title being used?

details.description: Export button loading spinner never clears
details.hint: Is setIsExporting(false) called in a finally block?

details.description: Export button not disabled during export - allows duplicate downloads
details.hint: Is the export button disabled when isExporting is true?

details.description: Search is case-sensitive - should be case-insensitive
details.hint: Is toLowerCase() used when comparing search query with titles?

details.description: Search ignores folder filter - shows results from all folders
details.hint: Is folder filtering applied regardless of search query?

details.description: Clear search button doesn't work - search state not cleared
details.hint: Does handleClearSearch actually call setSearchQuery('')?

details.description: Search input doesn't debounce - causes lag on every keystroke
details.hint: Is useDebounce being used for the search query?

details.description: Folder dropdown shows all users' folders - Missing user_id filter
details.hint: In GET /folders, is the query filtering by user_id?

details.description: Folder selection not saved with diagram - folder_id not included in save
details.hint: When saving diagram, is folder_id included in the request body?

details.description: Create folder with empty name succeeds - missing validation
details.hint: Is there validation to prevent empty folder names?
